name: Sort by Comments
author: Thomas Misund Hansen

sections.description: Adds some forum functionality to WordPress. Changes the order of posts so that the most recently commented posts show up first. Also displays last comment with the posts. Changes affect home page only. Intended for use with the Prologue theme.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the sort-by-comments directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Enjoy
sections.faq:
Where can I ask questions?

Leave a comment at the plugin page in my blog.
